name: Hunted Skies
description:
Arial combat, PVE,  Aircraft Fighter against Monsters. Lazers and Bullets to fight it with Upgradable weaponry and Armors.

a Continuous game, that can reach player level 99, and +99 stage level to play with.

an exciting one-on-one Battle with monsters that are set up to match stage level and player level. Well, levels are just numbers. Skills to play and handle the fast-paced battles are focused on.
